name: work in progress (Sweaters) (Sweaters)
description:
W.I.P is a game about game development and the struggles that come with it. As a player character come to life you can communicate with the developer as they work on your game.
  • 4 unique endings!
  • 3.5 complex characters!
  • 9 whole colours!

Music! "Ludum Dare 32 - Track 2" by Abstraction. They make awesome stuff! find em here: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

created using p5.js and my own engine: 3p5E.js
